Schedule Review Process

After creating or editing a schedule you will be given the option of sending the schedule for review. Enter the signum or email address of the people that you would like to review the schedule. Press 'Send & Save' to send the schedule for review.





The reviewers will be sent an email, requesting that they review the schedule.





Clicking the link will open the schedule review page where the reviewer can approve or reject the schedule and leave comments if desired.
